Package com.github.robtimus.connect.sdk.java.springboot.actuator

Class ConnectSdkHealthIndicator

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.actuate.health.AbstractHealthIndicator
com.github.robtimus.connect.sdk.java.springboot.actuator.ConnectSdkHealthIndicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
HealthContributor, HealthIndicator
public class ConnectSdkHealthIndicator extends AbstractHealthIndicator
HealthIndicator for connect-sdk-java. This HealthIndicator uses merchantClient.services().testconnection() to check the connectivity to the Worldline Connect Server API.
Author:
Rob Spoor
